title: TIAA
summary: Up your financial savvy and track your investments – any time, any place.
description: What can you do with the TIAA app?Glad you asked. View your retirement plan balances and rates of return on the go. We offer brokerage trading for equities, ETFs, and mutual funds. You can also fund your brokerage and TIAA Personal Portfolio account without having to log into your home computer. View your tax statements anytime, anywhere - right from the palm of your hand. Easily transfer funds, check pending transactions, share a file with TIAA, view your checking account and more! TIAA is proud to offer ease and convenience with just a single swipe or tap of your smartphone. Exciting new features are at hand. Download the TIAA app today.Log in - Quickly and securely with Fingerprint Authentication.Banking - Pay your bill or deposit your check right from your phone. *Brokerage trading - Buy and sell equities, ETFs and mutual funds while on the go.  Transfer funds - Move money from one bank account to another using your finger.Pending transactions - Monitor your transaction requests.Peek View - View your total portfolio and balances without logging in.  Stay on top of your investments - Monitor your account activity, contributions and asset allocation.Track fund performance - Regardless if it’s your own funds or ones you’re just watching.Register for account access - easily manage your portfolio digitally with just a few clicks.Contact TIAA - Find an ATM, contact your advisor, share a file, locate offices, and send a message.Your TIAA mobile app is here to help you reach your financial goals. TIAA Founder Andrew Carnegie established that dedication almost 100 years ago. That same commitment is evident today. *Banking services and products are provided by TIAA, FSB.  Member FDIC.TIAA Direct® is a division of TIAA, FSB.Investing involves risk and your investments may gain or lose value, and will fluctuate over time. Investment, insurance and annuity products are not FDIC insured, are not bank guaranteed, are not bank deposits, are not insured by any federal government agency, are not a condition to any banking service or activity, and may lose value. Certain securities may not be suitable for all investors.TIAA Brokerage, a division of TIAA-CREF Individual & Institutional Services, LLC, Member FINRA and SIPC , distributes securities. Brokerage accounts are carried by Pershing, LLC, a subsidiary of The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation, Member FINRA, NYSE, SIPC. 313137
descriptionHTML:
What can you do with the TIAA app?

Glad you asked. View your retirement plan balances and rates of return on the go.
We offer brokerage trading for equities, ETFs, and mutual funds. You can also fund your brokerage and TIAA Personal Portfolio account without having to log into your home computer. View your tax statements anytime, anywhere - right from the palm of your hand. Easily transfer funds, check pending transactions, share a file with TIAA, view your checking account and more! 

TIAA is proud to offer ease and convenience with just a single swipe or tap of your smartphone. Exciting new features are at hand. Download the TIAA app today.

Log in - Quickly and securely with Fingerprint Authentication.

Banking - Pay your bill or deposit your check right from your phone. *

Brokerage trading - Buy and sell equities, ETFs and mutual funds while on the go.  

Transfer funds - Move money from one bank account to another using your finger.

Pending transactions - Monitor your transaction requests.

Peek View - View your total portfolio and balances without logging in.  

Stay on top of your investments - Monitor your account activity, contributions and asset allocation.

Track fund performance - Regardless if it’s your own funds or ones you’re just watching.

Register for account access - easily manage your portfolio digitally with just a few clicks.

Contact TIAA - Find an ATM, contact your advisor, share a file, locate offices, and send a message.

Your TIAA mobile app is here to help you reach your financial goals. TIAA Founder Andrew Carnegie established that dedication almost 100 years ago. That same commitment is evident today.



*Banking services and products are provided by TIAA, FSB. Member FDIC.
TIAA Direct® is a division of TIAA, FSB.

Investing involves risk and your investments may gain or lose value, and will fluctuate over time. Investment, insurance and annuity products are not FDIC insured, are not bank guaranteed, are not bank deposits, are not insured by any federal government agency, are not a condition to any banking service or activity, and may lose value. Certain securities may not be suitable for all investors.

TIAA Brokerage, a division of TIAA-CREF Individual & Institutional Services, LLC, Member FINRA and SIPC , distributes securities. Brokerage accounts are carried by Pershing, LLC, a subsidiary of The Bank of New York Mellon Corporation, Member FINRA, NYSE, SIPC.


313137
comments: When I can logon, it is good. Problem is, 90% of the time the app crashes and is forced to restart, over and over.
It is simple, inviting an easy to use
This app is very convenient tracking my portfolio
Easy, intuitive and clean. One of my favorite banking apps on my phone.
recentChanges: · Our mobile app is now accessible to all TIAA Direct app users. Customers can easily navigate through the mobile app to view account information, pay bills, transfer money, deposit checks, and more from a smartphone.
· Minor app improvements continue to enhance the customer experience.
